storyInfo: Lavinia is deeply affected by the death of her former colleague-turned-hitman. Leontuzzo tries to persuade Lavinia to drop her investigation, and just as the two reach an impasse, Texas volunteers to stand trial as the murderer.

attributes.content: Why is she here...?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: It's T-Texas!
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: We've already lost a lot of our men!
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: Tch, we shouldn't have let Lavinia talk to that piece of trash for so long.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Forget it. After seeing her colleague fall to utter depravity, that woman's spirit is done for.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: As long as we can snuff out Leon's childishness, it doesn't matter how we do it.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Call our people back. We're leaving.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: They... They turned around and left!
attributes.name: Court Clerk

attributes.content: He's already dead. Took an arrow straight through the heart.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Thank you. If not for you all, I'd have been the one to die here.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Close your eyes, murderer.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: What's this...?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: A notebook?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: A Siracusan judge license. He was keeping it in his breast pocket.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Its corner has been clipped, and it's written here that the holder was disbarred three years ago for malfeasance.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Malfeasance, huh. Malfeasance.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Could they really not come up with a better excuse?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Are you alright?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I... think I should be asking you how you got out of prison.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Trade secret.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Fair enough. I don't have the energy to pursue that either right now.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You need to rest.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I can't do that just yet.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: This trail has gone cold. I need another lead.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Yan has a saying: 'haste makes waste.'
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Of course I know that.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But time is a luxury I can't afford anymore.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Was Carracci important to you?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I only ever met him a few times.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: After all, I am a judge, and our roles could hardly be further apart.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But as any resident of Volsinii can tell you, he was an extremely vigorous man, smoothly navigating his relationships with the famiglie.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: He dedicated all his time and energy to the construction of the new city area, trying everything at his disposal to give the people a safer place to live.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: By investigating his death, I've come to better understand his life.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Carefully, delicately, as if walking on thin ice, he would desperate rack his brain to produce anything of value that could be exchanged for a little more breathing room to carry out his work.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: For example, building more schools and hospitals far away from the turf fought over by the famiglie.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I'm not sure how I should think of him. Maybe he was just a decent man, with the slightest bit of a conscience.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But the fates of decent people in Siracusa are already sealed.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Just like this man... a hitman carrying a judge license.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Siracusa has proper law schools.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: They use textbooks published in Columbia. After graduating, students aren't restricted to working in local Siracusan law firms and institutions.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: They also gain accreditation in Columbia.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Nowadays, our exchanges with Lungmen are becoming more and more frequent. Maybe with enough time, even Great Yan will come to recognize our certifications.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Sounds good.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: It is. Of course it's good.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But none of that makes any difference.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: My alma mater once invited me back to deliver a speech to my juniors, to give them some confidence.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: So I went.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: When I got up on that stage, I wanted to tell them to believe in what they had learned. But I just couldn't do it.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: In Siracusa, the law works because of the existence of a single person, not because it's based on any sort of universally-recognized fairness.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: In a sense, it's even more absurd than complete lawlessness.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: More incredibly, after almost sixty years, the Siracusans have gotten so used to living in this environment that nobody dares to question it now.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Am I justice personified? No. I might be a symbol, but even I do not know what stands behind my back.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: ...Want to grab a bite?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: ...That'd be nice.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Grazie.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I didn't expect you to be here, Leon.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I heard someone attacked you, so I rushed over.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Nothing major happened, thanks to Texas's help.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But we're at another dead end.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Just drop it already, Lavinia.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Leon... I believe we had an agreement not to bring up things that might spark an argument at the table.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Now's not the time for that.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: No, it's the only thing that lets us sit together and share a meal regardless of our positions.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: If you insist on breaking it, then I'm afraid I must take my leave, 'Padrone' Leontuzzo.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You're messing around with your life on the line here!
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I've been 'messing around with my life on the line' since the moment I became a judge in this city, Padrone.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I'm planning to talk to the Rossatis.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I don't care what they think about Cellinia's presence. This is a discussion they can't avoid.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: We have the initiative. As long as we can keep them down, it doesn't matter if we have a double-agent in our midst, or other famiglie at our throats. We'll suppress them all.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: That's not where the problem lies.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Things are incredibly tense throughout the city right now, and everyone's speculating about who did it. The situation will only spiral out of control unless we stabilize it.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I'll be frank. If you can really find the murderer, I'll spare no expense to help you push the case forward.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But right now, the other side has already come prepared. What you encountered today was, without a doubt, a warning shot.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Your investigation won't go anywhere, even if you try to press the issue. You're only going to land yourself in more trouble.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: So I should just go along with your plans, drop the investigation, and let this case fizzle out?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Lavinia, you're not the kind of person to get carried away by her emotions.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Leon, you've worked with Ministro Carracci before. You probably knew him better than I do.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Regardless of how he ended up in that position to begin with, he still was a person who could make the city a better place.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: These things happen every single day.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: So are those in Siracusa who want to be good people doomed to die?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You're more important to me than he was.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: To you, Ministro Carracci's death might be nothing more than a spell of heavy rain.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The rain won't fall on anyone who's standing inside, so you just wonder why it's lasting for so long.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: If you're feeling particularly generous, you might even hand out some umbrellas to the people on the streets.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But for me... I'm sick and tired of asking myself how long I plan to stand there under the roof.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But how are you going to stop the rain all by yourself?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: At least this time, I don't want to feel like a helpless bystander watching someone like Carracci die for nothing.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I've already done too much against my will.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Leon, if - and I mean if - my life could be exchanged for something...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: That might make things a bit more bearable for me.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: One thing I learned from the Columbians is—
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: If you want someone to listen to you, incentives can be more useful than violence.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But that doesn't mean I won't ever choose violence, Lavinia.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: And this is exactly what I was talking about: the biggest difference between you and me.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You've always got the option of violence, but you refrain from using it because of your upbringing and self-control. I'd even like to thank you for your kindness.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: That's not what I meant.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: And I'm not blaming you either, Leon.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: For you to even consider why the rain hasn't stopped yet is already exceptionally rare to see.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But you are the next head of Famiglia Bellone.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: And I'm just a judge who can't help herself.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Our world views have always been fundamentally different.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Let's leave things here, Leon.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: If you really want to help me, then keep doing what you need to do.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: If you're able to negotiate with the Rossatis, that would already help ease up the situation.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: However, unless you lock me up right now, nobody will stop me from finding the murderer.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Silence falls across the restaurant.
Leontuzzo wants to think of something else to say, but all the words he can muster in his mind come up blank.
His throat twitches twice, but no words come out.
Hold on.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Texas?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Oh right, you should head back with Leon. He'll need you in his negotiations with the Rossatis.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: No, I have a better idea.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You needed a culprit, right? Then I'll be the culprit.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Do you even know what you're saying...?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: It's the quickest way to get the situation under control.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I... don't need others to take pity on me.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Don't get the wrong idea.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I'm doing this for myself.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You're both right. If things continue like this, the situation will only get more and more chaotic, making it harder to find who's actually pulling the strings.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: The best method we have is to find the killer before everything spirals out of control.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: And of course, the other side will do everything in their power to prevent that.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: So you're going to offer yourself up as bait?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Nobody else is a juicy enough target. I might just fit the bill.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You'd make Texas into the real criminals, and sacrifice some renown to take on all the blame, using peoples' ignorance of your famiglia.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: And after that, you can release me.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: That would be the fastest way to stabilize the situation, while also potentially drawing the true mastermind out of hiding.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: An ambitious plan... but it might be worth a shot.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: However, you're the last of the Texas bloodline, and this is Siracusa.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Personally, the most important thing about the Texas name is the reputation it brings me.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: As I said before, I only have one goal: to see through my agreement with Bellone, and then leave Siracusa.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Then why... Why would you go out of your way to do this?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I also have a number of friends who are trying to change things for the better, in a place called Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I'd never accept them dying in vain either.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: If this plan goes well...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: It might even put the other forces behind the scenes in counter-check.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I'm really starting to count my lucky stars that you're on our side.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Spare me.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: If this is what we're going with, we'll need this trial to be a barn-burner. Ultimately, that's the only way we're going to keep the other famiglie down.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I'll handle all the other arrangements.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Now's our chance to hit back.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Then can you give me your assurance that you'll let me leave Siracusa?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I swear this to you: once we successfully execute this plan, nobody will pursue you ever again.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Those who've kept an eye on you, be it the Rossatis or any other famiglia, will only know that...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: 'Cellinia Texas broke out of prison and fled Siracusa.'
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Sorry, Lavinia. This might fly in the face of the dignity of the law.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: No... I don't think so.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: All that remains... is to see things through.
attributes.name: Lavinia
